section.text: *NOTE: This section includes amendments by emergency legislation that will expire on February 22, 2026. To view the text of this section after the expiration of all emergency and temporary legislation, click this link: Permanent Version.*
section.heading: Operation of bingo and raffles.
section.text: Bingo and raffles may be conducted in the District only in accordance with this title, any rules issued pursuant to this title, and any other applicable law or rules.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2073(c) of Fiscal Year 2026 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2025 (D.C. Act 26-146, Sept. 3, 2025, 72 DCR 9623).
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2073(c) of Fiscal Year 2026 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2025 (D.C. Act 26-210, Nov. 24, 2025, 0 DCR 0).
